name: OnlineReviewsTheScience,EthicsandBusiness
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Forrester Research has dubbed this time period as the Age of the Customer, where reviews affect buying decisions more than virtually any other factor. Tune in every week to learn the latest about the research done by The Review Society (reviewsociety.org), a membership organization dedicated to the science, ethics and business of online reviews, and the new tools and events happening in the world of consumer to business and business to business online reviews.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
